description: SERVE IT UP Mama Pork Noodles are perfect as a snack but can easily be turned into a meal by adding cooked chicken, pork or prawns and veg. Also available in a Tom Yum flavour.
name: Mushroom & Greens Ramen Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 pkt 90g pkts Mama Pork Flavour Jumbo Instant Noodles
1 pkt long red chilli, thinly sliced
1 bunch baby bok choy, quartered lengthways
2 tbs sesame seeds, toasted, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Place seasoning from noodle packets and 1.5L cold water in a medium saucepan. Bring to the boil over medium-high heat.
Meanwhile, combine soy and chilli in a small bowl.
Add mushroom to seasoned broth and cook for 2 minutes. Add noodles to pan and top with bok choy. Cover and remove pan from heat. Stand for 3 minutes or until greens have wilted.
